translation.en: Sometimes when I first wake up,
my heart is racing and my throat is dry.
translation.fr:
mon cœur bat la chamade
et j'ai la gorge sèche.

translation.en: Can't figure out if the pills are making the dreams more real
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas si les cachets
rendent les rêves plusréels

translation.en: or the reason they're not worse.
translation.fr: ou s'ils les rendent moins terribles.

translation.en: Even on good days, I still feel like I don't fit in.
translation.fr: Même les bons jours, je me sens décalée.

translation.en: Like everyone else has it all figured out.
translation.fr: Les autres savent qui ils sont.

translation.en: -You were almost out. -Already? Are you feeling okay?
translation.fr:
- Tu n'en avais plus.
- Déjà ? Tu te sens bien ?

translation.en: Of course I'm not fine and they know it.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas vrai et ils le savent.

translation.en: They just want me to say it out loud.
Because that would be the end of everything
translation.fr: Parce que ce serait la fin

translation.en: and I'm not ready for whatever comes next.
translation.fr: et je ne suis pas prête.

translation.en: It's been three weeks since your birthday.
translation.fr: Ton anniversaire remonte à trois semaines.

translation.en: We know you're nervous but we both think that it's time you--
translation.fr:
On sait que tu es anxieuse,
mais il est temps...

translation.en: Elinor, have you been out all night?
translation.fr: Elinor, tu as passé la nuit dehors ?

translation.en: If I'm home now, does it really matter?
translation.fr: Si je suis là, c'est si important que ça ?

translation.en: It does when you work for me.
translation.fr: Si tu travailles pour moi, oui.

translation.en: One day, I, too, will be a self-confident, bull-by-the-horns kind of girl
translation.fr: Un jour, moi aussi, je serai sûre de moi.

translation.en: who doesn't give a shit what my parents think.
translation.fr:
Je me ficherai
de ce que pensent mes parents.

translation.en: [sighs] Juliette, could you please remind Ben that we have a doorbell?
translation.fr:
Juliette, pourrais-tu rappeler
à Ben qu'on a une sonnette ?

translation.en: One day, I am going to kill him.
You are the prettiest peach I ever seen.
Well, aren't you just the sweetest thing?
[Juliette] Ben Wheeler is the kind of boy you fall in love with.
We've been jumping around in dirty puddles
translation.fr: On saute dans des flaques d'eau

translation.en: and reading every book on my mother's shelf since we were born.
translation.fr:
et on lit tous les livres de ma mère
depuis toujours.

translation.en: We dated for a month when we were 12.
translation.fr:
On est sortis ensemble
pendant un mois à 12 ans.

translation.en: The star athlete who gets invited to all the parties.
translation.fr:
L'athlète qui est invité
à toutes les fêtes.

Et si je suis populaire,
c'est par association.

translation.en: when I'm with Ben, I blend in.
translation.fr: grâce à Ben, je me fonds dans la masse.

translation.en: The headaches are still raging but nobody knows,
translation.fr:
J'ai toujours des migraines
mais personne ne le sait

translation.en: because he makes me feel and look normal.
translation.fr: parce qu'avec lui, je me sens normale.

translation.en: And fun and sexy, but I don't wanna try too hard.
translation.fr: ...sexy, mais je dois y aller mollo.

translation.en: Hey, lots of people like this face.
translation.fr: Ma tête plaît à beaucoup de gens.

translation.en: Noah Harrington's confused, but he'll come out.
translation.fr: Il est paumé, mais ça lui passera.

translation.en: [voice slows, distorts] Stay out of the sun.
So I'll pick you up at 9:00?
At Noah's. You promised you'd go.
translation.fr: Chez Noah. Tu me l'avais promis.

translation.en: Why would I do that? I hate parties.
But you love me and you have to go.
translation.fr: Mais tu m'adores. Tu dois venir.

translation.en: [clears throat] Look, far be it from me to stand in the way of quiet pining,
translation.fr:
Loin de moi l'idée de t'empêcher
de te languir en silence,

translation.en: but, you know, you could just talk to her.
♪ I look into your eyes I feel my pulse, begin to wonder ♪
♪ Love me like a river Hold my breath, I'm going under ♪
translation.fr:
BIENVENUE AU LYCÉE LANCASTER
LA DEMEURE DES FAUCONS

translation.en: Okay. Why don't you just start with something small, like your name?
translation.fr:
Commence par un truc simple.
Comme ton nom ?

translation.en: We could do a whole Cyrano thing where I could be doing the--
translation.fr:
On pourrait faire comme Cyrano,
je ferais...

translation.en: Got that Prada jacket. I'll go vintage on the bottom
translation.fr: Un haut Prada. Un bas vintage,

translation.en: so I don't look like a label whore. Watch out!
translation.fr: pour ne pas faire accro. Attention !

translation.en: [Calliope] I'm sorry. That was my fault.
Oh, I just mean I like Calliope.
translation.fr:
Je veux dire
que j'aime bien le nom Calliopé.

translation.en: You should meet my brothers Theseus and Apollo.
translation.fr:
Tu adorerais mes frères,
Thésée et Apollon.
Mais il y a une fête.

translation.en: My friend Ben is making me go.
translation.fr: J'ai promis à Ben d'y aller.

translation.en: But I promised I'd go so...
If you decide to go too, then maybe I'll see you?
translation.fr:
Si tu décides d'y aller aussi,
on se verra peut-être ?

translation.en: I think that only works with eyelashes.
translation.fr: Ça ne marche qu'avec les cils.

translation.en: But I guess I'll see you in English first.
translation.fr: Mais on se verra d'abord en anglais.

translation.en: You don't wanna miss this one.
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas rater ça.

translation.en: I hope that's a love letter to Flannery O'Connor.
translation.fr:
Une lettre d'amour
pour Flannery O'Connor ?

translation.en: the world is a little sharper.
just when I think it's too much,
translation.fr: juste au moment où j'allais craquer,

translation.en: Ms. Burns. I know you just transferred in,
but surely clocks work the same way at your old school.
translation.fr:
Mais les horloges fonctionnent
de la même façon partout.

translation.en: Since you're already up, I'm sure you won't mind getting us started.
translation.fr:
Mais puisque vous êtes debout,
je vous prie de commencer.

translation.en: [Calliope] "Hazel Motes sat at a forward angle on the green, plush train seat."
translation.fr:
"Hazel Motes était assis, penché en avant,
sur le siège vert du train,

translation.en: "Looking one minute at the window as if he might wanna jump out of it,
translation.fr:
son regard passant de la fenêtre
qu'il fixait comme s'il voulait sauter,

translation.en: and the next down the aisle at the other end of the car."
"The train was racing through tree tops..."
Why do you show up now?
I can't shake the fear that as soon as I blink,
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas cligner des yeux de peur

translation.en: and the few hogs nosing in the furrows looked like large, spotted stones."
translation.fr:
et les rares porcs ressemblaient
à de grosses pierres tachetées."

translation.en: Setting is never just a backdrop in a story.
translation.fr: Le décor n'est pas qu'une toile de fond.

translation.en: often the first one we meet.

translation.fr: Tu n'es pas mon premier béguin.

translation.en: Like I know we're going to happen.
It's silly, but when you're swimming around in my head like this,
translation.fr:
C'est bête, mais quand je pense
à toi comme ça,

translation.en: Somehow, an hour goes by in five minutes.
translation.fr: Une heure passe en cinq minutes.

translation.en: -[school bell rings] -[Mr. Porter] Essays due on Wednesday.
Mark the dates on your phones.
That's what those calendar apps are for.
translation.fr: C'est à ça que servent ces applis.

translation.en: You coming tonight? Brad's gonna come, right?
translation.fr: Tu viens ce soir ? Brad va venir ?

translation.en: He has to come. He's bringing beer.
translation.fr: Il se charge de la bière.

translation.en: I haven't told anyone, of course.
translation.fr: Je ne l'ai dit à personne.

translation.en: So why do I keep wishing I could tell you?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi est-ce que j'aimerais
pouvoir te le dire?

translation.en: There's a party tonight at Noah Harrington's
translation.fr: Il y a une fête ce soir chez Noah
et tout le monde y va.

translation.en: so I wanted to see if I could go.
translation.fr: Je voulais voir si je pouvais y aller.

translation.en: Please tell me the night terrors haven't started.
Then I don't see why not.

translation.fr: Tu as fouillé dans mon sac ?

translation.en: They clearly aren't effective anymore. Your body is changing.
translation.fr:
Ils ne sont plus efficaces.
Ton corps change.

translation.en: We shouldn't have let her wait this long.
translation.fr: On n'aurait pas dû autant attendre.
Papa, je ne suis pas prête.

translation.en: Sweetie, I know that it's scary.
translation.fr: Je sais que ça fait peur.

translation.en: No. No, it's not scary. It's wrong.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas que ça fait peur. C'est mal.

translation.en: -I don't know why I have to! -Because every day you don't,
you put yourself and this entire family at risk.
translation.fr:
plus c'est dangereux pour toi.
Et pour nous.

translation.en: There are humans trained to hunt and kill us.
Your father has made it safe for us in Savannah, as safe as he can,
translation.fr:
Grâce à ton père, on est à l'abri ici
à Savannah.

translation.en: but we survived by our commitment to blending in.
translation.fr:
Mais on a survécu parce qu'on a tout fait
pour s'intégrer.

translation.en: And every day that you refuse to embrace your nature,
you are closer to the day where it controls you.
translation.fr: c'est risquer de perdre le contrôle.

translation.en: The day that you kill recklessly because you simply must feed.
translation.fr:
Un jour, tu tueras imprudemment
parce que tu auras besoin de te nourrir.

translation.en: Oh, no. What did you do this time, Jules?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu as encore fait ?

translation.en: I just wanted to go to a party.
translation.fr: Je voulais aller à une fête.

translation.en: Is that what you plan to wear?
translation.fr: Tu comptes y aller comme ça ?

translation.en: Come with me. We can do better.
As soon as you take your talons out of my arm.
translation.fr: Dès que tu m'auras lâché le bras.

translation.en: You know, it's okay to be nervous, sweet little.
Your first kill's a big step.
-What if I don't wanna change? -You're already changing.
translation.fr:
- Si je ne veux pas ?
- Tu es déjà en train de changer.

translation.en: Which is why the pills aren't working.
translation.fr:
C'est pour ça
que les cachets ne marchent plus.

translation.en: The kill just kind of tips the scale.
You know, he barely even fought back.
I think some people prefer to die young.
The right hair jewelry and a perfect big juicy carotid artery.
translation.fr:
Une belle barrette et
une belle carotide bien juteuse.

translation.en: You are going to have so much fun.
Just go out there and find someone.
translation.fr: Vas-y et jette ton dévolu sur quelqu'un.

- Elle me plaît.
- Tu la veux.
Je ne veux pas lui faire de mal.
Ni à elle ni à personne.

translation.en: Does your throat feel like it's on fire yet?
translation.fr: Tu as la gorge en feu ?
Tu pleures des larmes de sang ?

translation.en: You keep putting this off, it's only going to get worse.
translation.fr:
Si tu attends trop longtemps,
ça va empirer.

translation.en: and always finish what you start.
translation.fr: et finis ce que tu commences.

translation.en: Wait, what? No. I'm supposed to be your wingwoman.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Je suis censée être ton acolyte.

translation.en: Yeah. Time for you to learn how to fly.
Wow, okay. Not wasting any time, huh?
translation.fr: Je vois. Tu ne perds pas de temps.

translation.en: And have wanted to do that for a while now.
And would like to do it again.
[Calliope] I think a lot about how the world treats teenage girls.
translation.fr:
Je pense souvent à la façon dont
la société voie les adolescentes.

translation.en: Like, everything that's good about us is a weakness.
translation.fr:
En gros, tout ce qu'il y a de bien
chez nous devient une faiblesse.

translation.en: our empathy, means we need to be protected.
translation.fr:
notre empathie, tout ça veut dire
qu'on doit être protégées.

translation.en: -Want me to drop you off at school? -I'm good.
translation.fr:
- Je te dépose ?
- Non, c'est bon.

translation.en: like they know I have all the potential in the world,
but I have a lot to learn.
All I know is I'm ready to prove to them what I'm capable of.
translation.fr: Mais je me sens prête à faire mes preuves.

translation.en: It's not easy to make friends
translation.fr: Difficile de se faire des amis

translation.en: when you know you'll be in a new city in a few months.
translation.fr:
quand on sait qu'on déménagera
dans quelques mois.

translation.en: So head up, shoulders back, smile politely.
translation.fr:
Donc, tête haute, dos bien droit,
sourire poli.

translation.en: [Calliope] Every day, I just go through the day so I can get back home,
translation.fr:
Je passe mes journées à attendre
le moment où je pourrai rentrer chez moi,

translation.en: to the only place I feel normal. With my family.
translation.fr:
le seul endroit où je me sens normale.
Avec ma famille.

translation.en: When my parents first started hunting,
translation.fr: Quand mes parents ont commencé à chasser,

translation.en: For years, every time I'd close my eyes,
translation.fr:
Pendant des années,
dès que je fermais les yeux,

translation.en: Ones with claws as long as steak knives,
translation.fr:
Avec des griffes aussi longues
que des couteaux,

translation.en: That was before I learned the worst ones always look human.
translation.fr:
C'était avant d'apprendre
que les pires ont toujours l'air humain.

translation.en: I learned that from JoJo when I was 3.
translation.fr:
J'avais trois ans
quand Jojo me l'a appris.

translation.en: She's the first Guild Guardian I ever met.
translation.fr:
C'est la première gardienne de la Guilde
que j'ai connue.

translation.en: My parents were on assignment in Paris at the time.
translation.fr: Mes parents étaient en mission à Paris.

translation.en: The Guardians were doing what I've seen them do
translation.fr: Les Gardiens faisaient ce que je les ai

translation.en: warding off monsters and evil spirits
translation.fr:
chasser les monstres
et les esprits maléfiques

translation.en: with special candles, bunches of sage,
translation.fr: avec des bougies spéciales, de la sauge,
et du sel de mer judicieusement placé.

translation.en: I don't know how I unpacked all those boxes so quickly.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas comment j'ai déballé
ces cartons si vite.

translation.en: Where do you wanna put this one?
Rituals: A sequence of important activities,
In other words, get your narrow ass out my way
translation.fr:
En d'autres termes,
bouge ton petit cul de là

translation.en: so I can do my job right.

translation.fr:
- Où allez-vous ?
- On a un tuyau, Calliopé.

translation.en: And saying my name like that isn't gonna make me not wanna go.
translation.fr: Dire mon nom ne m'empêchera pas de venir.

translation.en: Out at Colonial Park Cemetery. Get back in the house, we gotta go.
translation.fr:
Le cimetière Colonial Park.
Rentre, on doit y aller.
On en a pour une minute.

translation.en: No, we're not. Don't be ridiculous.
It's gonna take a lot longer than a minute.
It takes a few hours for the wards to cure.
So you keep your eyes open.
-[volume lowers] -Why do you think they're showing up now?
The Guild sent us to kill them. So we kill them.
translation.fr: La Guilde nous envoie les tuer. On obéit.

translation.en: It's actually a great question, Cal.
Good to know why you're doing the things you're asked to do.
translation.fr:
C'est bien de savoir
pourquoi on fait ce qu'on fait.

translation.en: We're monster hunters. That's why we do what we do.
But 25 years since the Guild came through and cleaned up
translation.fr: Mais 25 ans après l'arrivée de la Guilde,

translation.en: and now they're just back? Strange, right?
It's strange it took them so long.
Savannah's always tough to keep clean.
The cemetery we're going to now dates back three centuries.
translation.fr: Ce cimetière a au moins trois siècles.

translation.en: Final resting place of over 10,000 souls,
including victims of the yellow fever epidemic
translation.fr: dont des victimes de la fièvre jaune.

translation.en: and graves desecrated by Sherman's army.
translation.fr:
Sans compter les tombes profanées
par l'armée de Sherman.

translation.en: That's your big brother's way of saying
you can't keep a good ghost down.
translation.fr: que rien n'arrête un bon fantôme.

translation.en: [Calliope] I spend a lot of time pretending to be normal.
translation.fr:
Je passe mon temps
à faire semblant d'être normale.

translation.en: Normal families go to the movies,
translation.fr: Les gens normaux vont au cinéma,

translation.en: have cookouts in the back yard.
Go fishing. Take trips to Disneyland.
translation.fr: Ils vont à la pêche. À Disneyland.

translation.en: Said you got a tip. What kind of tip?
Disturbed graves, exhumed bodies, some very human-looking teeth.
translation.fr:
Des tombes ouvertes, des corps exhumés,
des dents très humaines.

- On a pensé...
- À des goules.

translation.en: I love them. They don't beg, don't plead.
translation.fr: Je les adore. Elles ne supplient pas.

translation.en: Don't ask a lot of questions.
-Lookout is a vital part of the job. -Keeping you safe

translation.fr: pour que maman ne nous tue pas.

translation.en: [Calliope] One day, I'm going to be the greatest hunter who ever lived.
translation.fr:
Un jour, je serai le plus grand
chasseur de tous les temps.

translation.en: And these clowns will simply be known as my brothers.
translation.fr: Et ces clowns seront juste mes frères.

translation.en: Theo was 12 when he made his first kill on a sweep with my dad.
translation.fr:
Theo avait 12 ans quand il a tué
son premier monstre.

translation.en: he was 14 when he got his shot.
[Calliope] Me? I got my first chance last winter.
translation.fr:
Moi ? J'ai eu
ma première chance l'hiver dernier.

translation.en: When am I gonna get another shot?
It's up to Mom and Dad.
Well, I'm at 19 kills and I'd like to make it 20.
translation.fr:
J'ai tué 19 monstres,
j'aimerais arriver à 20.

translation.en: -So let's hope there's actually some-- -[monster snarling]

translation.fr: Ce soir, je fais le guet.

translation.en: Tasked with spotting monsters because I once missed one.
translation.fr:
Chargée de repérer les monstres
parce qu'un soir, j'en ai raté un.

translation.en: When hunting monsters, there are three rules.
translation.fr: Quand on chasse, il y a trois règles...

translation.en: And always finish what you start.
Just clocked the first one. May be a ghoul.
Clocked the second one, you got two.
Good, we each get our own.
Theo, you've got one two rows east, three graves north.
translation.fr:
Theo, deux rangées à l'est,
trois tombes au nord.

translation.en: Apollo, yours is on the move, go left.
translation.fr: Apollo, le tien bouge, à gauche.
Ce que tu es moche, toi.

translation.en: -[Calliope] See it, Theo? -Yep. About to go to work.
translation.fr:
- Tu le vois, Theo ?
- Oui. J'y vais.
Theo, il y en a un autre.

translation.en: Theo? Do you hear me? There's a third ghoul.
translation.fr: Tu m'entends ? Il y a une troisième goule.

translation.en: Yeah, you definitely had it, huh?
translation.fr: C'est ça que tu appelles gérer ?

translation.en: Mm-mm. I better see some salad on there too.
-So how'd it go? -Oh, you know, I did my thing, so...
translation.fr:
- Comment ça s'est passé ?
- J'ai fait mon boulot.

translation.en: Translation: two ghouls, we disposed of them in short measure.
translation.fr:
Traduction : deux goules,
on s'en est vite débarrassés.

translation.en: And one vamp. It just came out of nowhere.
translation.fr: Et un vampire. Sorti de nulle part.

translation.en: Really? A vampire in the same place as ghouls?
translation.fr: Vraiment ? Un vampire près des goules ?

translation.en: Yeah, the way it came at me was weird. Feral.
translation.fr:
Et la façon dont il m'a attaqué
m'a surpris. Bestial.

translation.en: -Good thing Cal clocked it. -[Talia] Oh, good job, baby.
translation.fr:
- Heureusement que Cal était là.
- Bravo, chérie.

translation.en: They didn't used to be so bold.
No wonder they sent us, huh? We'll get rid of them.
translation.fr:
Heureusement qu'on est là.
On va les exterminer.

translation.en: Love to finish a job before Pop gets home.
translation.fr: J'aimerais finir avant le retour de papa.

translation.en: He hates it when we do that.
They keep telling me my time is coming.
translation.fr: Ils disent que ce sera bientôt mon tour.

translation.en: They don't understand that until it does,
I won't feel like a member of this family.
translation.fr: si je ne faisais pas partie de la famille.

translation.en: Bam! I stabbed it right in the chest, right?
translation.fr: Je l'ai eue en plein cœur.

translation.en: The thing slides down my sword like meat on a skewer.
translation.fr:
Elle a glissé le long de l'épée
comme sur une brochette.

translation.en: You should let me go train at the Guild Academy right now.
translation.fr: Je suis prêt pour la Guilde.

- Salut, papa.
- Comment va ma fille ?

translation.en: -We'll be gone by Christmas. -I know, but...
translation.fr:
- On sera partis à Noël.
- Oui, mais...

translation.en: it doesn't mean you shouldn't try, baby.
translation.fr:
Ça ne veut pas dire
que tu ne dois pas essayer.

translation.en: You're 16 once, Cal. You're allowed to have a life.
translation.fr:
Tu as 16 ans, Cal.
Tu as le droit d'avoir une vie.
Ma vie est avec vous, papa.

translation.en: -If you let me show you. -Your turn is coming, baby.
translation.fr:
- Laisse-moi te le prouver.
- Ton tour viendra.

translation.en: As usual, we're gonna go over our assignments,
and as usual, Apollo will complain about his.
translation.fr: Apollon se plaindra de la sienne.

translation.en: [Jack] Okay, I'll let you handle it, babe. See you soon.
translation.fr: Je te laisse t'en occuper. À bientôt.

translation.en: [Talia] All right, let's see what we got.
Mm-mm. You have a job. It's called school.
Stop looking for something to be unhappy about, they're covers.
translation.fr:
Ne râle pas, ce sont juste
des couvertures.

translation.en: I worked in that gym for six weeks. Punched the clock every day.
translation.fr:
J'ai bossé six semaines de suite
dans ce club de gym.

translation.en: I'm sure the fact it was on a college campus
translation.fr: Le fait que c'était sur un campus

translation.en: full of pretty girls had nothing to do with your diligence.
translation.fr:
plein de jolies filles n'a rien
à voir avec ton zèle.

translation.en: -What does that even mean? -Whatever I need it to.
translation.fr:
- Ça veut dire quoi au juste ?
- Tout ce que je veux.

translation.en: You've gotta be kidding me. A trainer.
Oh, yeah, everybody can have a body like this.
translation.fr: On peut tous avoir un corps comme ça.

translation.en: You want me to lose my religion tonight?
I know that's the adrenaline rush from that kill talking.
translation.fr: C'est l'adrénaline du combat qui parle.

translation.en: But you better watch your language in my house. Hear me?
translation.fr: Mais surveille ton langage. Tu m'entends ?

translation.en: [Theo] Plus, it's not a bad cover.
You get to talk about your favorite subject all day. You.
translation.fr:
Tu peux parler de ton sujet
préféré toute la journée. Toi.

translation.en: Mom, can I please tell him to go to hell?
Sure, if you got somewhere else to live.
translation.fr: Oui, si tu as un autre endroit où aller.

translation.en: -I was beginning to wonder. -Just been busy.
translation.fr:
- Je me posais des questions.
- J'étais prise.

translation.en: You know how moving in can be.

translation.fr: Code pour "J'ai trouvé une autre fille

translation.en: and spent my time making out with her behind the gym"?

translation.fr:
- C'est ça.
- Tu peux me le dire.

- À quoi servent les amies ?
- Et les ex ?

translation.en: Come on, Cal. Who is she?

translation.fr:
- Je ne sais pas.
- Elle te plaît.

translation.en: -I'm not. -You used to be a better liar.
There was a moment, but we don't have a lot in common.
translation.fr:
Il y a eu un truc
mais on n'a rien en commun.

translation.en: Hate that. Straight girls should come with a warning.
translation.fr:
Les hétéros
devraient le dire haut et fort.

translation.en: No. Actually, I wanted to tell you.
translation.fr: Non. Je voulais te le dire.

translation.en: I did it. I got my first kill.
Fam's planning a surprise celebration they think I don't know about.
translation.fr:
Ma famille organise une fête
et pense que je n'en sais rien.

translation.en: Mom's calling to meet for dinner.
[Calliope] I'm from a lineage thousands of years old.
We're the best monster hunters to ever walk the earth.
translation.fr:
On est les meilleurs chasseurs de monstres
au monde.

translation.en: And still, even though my family loves me,
translation.fr: Et pourtant, même si ma famille m'aime,

translation.en: Because there's a feeling you get
when a monster's breath eases up your nostrils.
There's a warning prickle on the back of your neck.
translation.fr: Ça pique, au niveau de la nuque.

translation.en: Pretend to be kind, pretend to be gentle, pretend to be human...
translation.fr:
Fais semblant d'être gentille,
douce et humaine...

translation.en: but I know exactly what you are.
translation.fr: mais je sais ce que tu es.

translation.en: Why else would you need these?
"Nearer, the plowed fields curved and faded
and the few hogs nosing in the furrows
Setting is never just a backdrop in a story. It's a character,
translation.fr:
Le décor n'est pas qu'une toile de fond.
C'est un personnage.

translation.en: often the first one we meet.
It's important to note, then, the state...
[Calliope] My dad says that most hunters just know a monster when they see one.
translation.fr:
Mon père dit que les chasseurs
savent reconnaître un monstre.

translation.en: [Calliope] You just didn't look like one,
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas l'air d'un monstre.

translation.en: but you're the one they warned me about.
translation.fr:
Mais c'est contre toi
qu'on m'a mise en garde.

translation.en: The kind that leads with a smile.
translation.fr:
Le genre qui mène la danse
avec le sourire.

translation.en: And there's only one way this story ends.
translation.fr: Et il n'y a qu'une fin possible.

translation.en: Wow, okay. Not wasting any time, huh?
translation.fr: Je vois. Tu ne perds pas de temps.

translation.en: And I've wanted to do that for a while now.
And would like to do it again?
There are only three rules for being a great hunter.
translation.fr:
Il y a trois règles
pour être un bon chasseur.

translation.en: [Juliette] There are only three rules for your first kill.
translation.fr:
Il y a trois règles
pour réussir son premier meurtre.
